text: Richterswil (Swiss German: Richtischwiil) is a municipality in the district of Horgen in the canton of Zurich in Switzerland. It is on the lake Hüttnersee. ==Villages== *Richterswil *Samstagern *Burghalden ==Gallery== File:Zürichsee - Richterswil IMG 3675.JPG|Richterswil File:Samstagern - Schindellegi-Höhronen - Wädenswil Neuguet 2011-09-05 17-45-52.jpg|Samstagern ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Website * Category:Municipalities in Horgen Category:Cities in Switzerland
title: Richterswil
